select ic.created_time as createdTime, ic.content as content, ic.comment_level as commentsLevel, ic.sepc_name as specName, u.nickname as nickname, u.face as userFace from items_comments ic left join users u on ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
and ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url AS imgUrl, tempTab.price_discount AS price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, Min( price_discount ) AS price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY ( item_id ) ) tempTab ON i.id = tempTab.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${map.keywords}%'
ORDER BY
i.sell_counts desc
tempTab.price_discount desc
i.item_name desc
